title: Shadowheart
content:
goes out for a moment. She tells you that she heard Lady Shar's voice after she defied her. She has been abandoned by her goddess and allies. Powerless, she will now seek answers from Dame Aylin.

Shadowheart will earn the following rewards:

Moonbeam Selune's Spear of Night Moonlight Glaive
